title: Update a Corporate Minute Book
description: Following an annual shareholder meeting, a corporate paralegal needs to update the official corporate minute book.

tasks.description: Gather all relevant documents from the annual meeting: agenda, signed minutes, and any resolutions passed.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has all the necessary documents.

tasks.description: Add the new documents to the corporate minute book in the correct section and chronological order.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly files the new records.

tasks.description: Update the index of the minute book to reflect the newly added documents.
tasks.expected_outcome: The minute book's index is now current.
